Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: comcel
Reviews.Content: Good!! excellent items, its perfect and work excellent this is best good and I think buy more again thank you!!!

Reviews.Title: samsung digital camera
Reviews.Author: Hyalmar Rosales Manrique
Reviews.Content: Camara very good, has good resolution and is easy to set up, very good product, good quality durable and easy to recharge is the most important thing you do not need batteries.

Reviews.Title: can not complain the price was right
Reviews.Author: infideljon
Reviews.Content: this camera came just as advertised squished box but unused camera.  and is very easy to use and a great camera for anyone from kids to older people.

Reviews.Title: Didn't last a year
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My little sister received this camera as a Christmas gift last year and it didn't last a year before giant black spots appeared on the screen. You couldn't see the picture you were taking. I don't know if hers had some sort of defect with the screen but it's ridiculous how soon it happened without any damage to it.

Reviews.Title: Love my new Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Mandii.b
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera on Friday and it arrived on monday, just in time since i need this camera for one of my online classes! its in wonderful condition and i love the fact that it came with a battery and charger. i honestly wasnt expecting that. will order from Jim again if i need something hes got.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Lyindiana Money
Reviews.Content: I love the camera plus and the condition of the camera was wonderful, I got a brand new camera for a great price thank you.
